mapper.select: select * from mission where state <2 and geohash like concat(#{geohash},'%') and members>0 and id not in (select mid from m_details where wid=#{wid})

select m.id,m.mid,m.date,m.state,m.wid,m.filePath,w.uid,w.name,w.address,w.message,w.longtitude,w.latitude, w.demand,w.money,w.form,w.deadline,w.createtime,w.state,w.members from m_details as m left join mission as w on w.id = m.mid where m.wid=#{id} and m.state>3

select m.id,m.mid,m.date,m.wid,m.filePath,o.state,w.uid,w.name,w.address,w.message,w.longtitude,w.latitude, w.demand,w.money,w.form,w.deadline,w.createtime,w.state,w.members from m_details as m , mission as w ,orders as o where m.wid=#{id} and m.state>1 and m.state < 4 and o.uid=w.uid and o.wid=m.wid and w.id=m.mid

select m.id,m.mid,m.date,m.state,m.wid,m.filePath,w.uid,w.name,w.address,w.message,w.longtitude,w.latitude, w.demand,w.money,w.form,w.deadline,w.createtime,w.state,w.members from m_details as m left join mission as w on w.id = m.mid where m.wid=#{id} and m.state >= 4
mapper.update: update mission set state = 2 where id=#{id}
